name: A Dark Ice Saga: The Rescue
name_original: A Dark Ice Saga: The Rescue
description:
As you run down the slopes of Black Ice Mountain, your robot-friend Citrus was destroyed by Antag! Playing as the hero Dark Ice, your mission is to: Retrieve Citrus's robot pieces, vanquish Antag, and restore you FRIENDSHIP!

Keyboard
Arrows- Movement
A- Jump
Enter- Enter
Esc- Menu (Save)
F1- Options (When game is windowed, not full screen)

Game recommended to be played using a gamepad with a PC Controller Keyboard Emulator

A Dark Ice Saga:
The Rescue
